title: Good Shepherd Donation Drive
content:
The Good Shepherd Donation Drive benefits Portland Rescue Mission’s one-year residential Christ-centered recovery program. New Life Ministries is located at Shepherd’s Door for women and children and at The Harbor for men.

We are collecting items to support program participant needs, basic pantry staples and summer fun for 100 men, women and children “staying home” during a COVID 19 Summer.

The items we collect and donate give hope and restore life to men, women and children affected by homelessness and addiction.

Collect items in a bag or box, in the trunk of your car, and deliver them to Good Shepherd Community Church, on Sunday May 17th between 1-3pm.
